answers.answer: Hi kk54, welcome to the MS forum.So, who sent you for an MRI?  It's showing demyelinating disease? Do you have the report?I'm osrry you are feeling so badly. I have trouble blowing my hair out too.  I've been waiting awhile now after a shower for the effect of the hot water to wear off so I get a bit of my arms back and that seems to help a little.If you can, tell us what the Dr who ordered the MRI is saying about your MRI - k?Thanks for coming along,see you around soon,Shell
